DOC.detailed_description: Outline : Two-arm , open-label , randomize , 2-stage Phase II trial . Patients randomize first stage 1 2 treatment arm : Arm A - 10 mg/kg MGd per week Arm B - 15 mg/kg MGd every 3 week Patients treat 3 week cycle , maximum 8 cycle ( 24 week ) . Patients either objective response stable disease 2 cycle receive 8 cycle therapy . Patients progressive disease terminate study . At end Stage I , treatment arm evaluate , arm ( ) demonstrate least one response ( Complete Response Partial Response ) proceed Stage II . If arm demonstrate response , proceed Stage II .
